H0.text: Who is the patron saint of music? (Feast Day 22nd November). St. Gregory

H1.text: Who is the patron saint of music? (Feast Day 22nd November). St. John the Baptist

H2.text: Who is the patron saint of music? (Feast Day 22nd November). St. Ambrose

H3.text: Who is the patron saint of music? (Feast Day 22nd November). St. Cecil

A4.text: Saint Cecilia became the patroness of music and musicians, it being written that, as the musicians played at her wedding, Cecilia 'sang in her heart to the Lord'.

A5.text: The papal bull Ratione congruit, issued by Sixtus V in 158@include both Gregory the Great and Saint Cecilia, the patron saint of music.
